name: local-fonts-manager
description: Access local system fonts from Node.js and Electron

scripts.install: node-gyp configure && node-gyp build && rm build/node_gyp_bins/python3
scripts.build: node-gyp configure && node-gyp build && rm build/node_gyp_bins/python3
scripts.rebuild: node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build && rm build/node_gyp_bins/python3

author: Jaros≈Çaw Foksa
